Articles.Content: hey peeps, just wanted to know what kind of things I should know before uploading modified CFG's i.e in my recent episode of my youtube series I have made an apollo type craft where I have edited some parts from Lionhead aerospace. Now I know I cant upload the mods with my craft without permission, but what about custom cfg's? do they come under the same kind of permission? cheers for the help

Read the license of the mod in question. That will govern what you can and can't do with the files.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
